Diamond.en: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

Pearl.en: If its cloak is broken in battle, it quickly remakes the cloak with materials nearby.

Platinum.en: Even if it is born where there are no cocooning materials, it somehow always ends up with a cloak.

HeartGold.en: It covers itself with a cloak to shelter from the cold. When it's hot, its cloak is thinner.

SoulSilver.en: It covers itself with a cloak to shelter from the cold. When it's hot, its cloak is thinner.
